title: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
excerpt: Delicious pasta dish with garlic butter shrimp
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions
In a skillet, melt butter and saut√© garlic until fragrant
Add shrimp and cook until pink
Toss cooked pasta with shrimp mixture

seo.title: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta Recipe

title: Lemon Herb Shrimp Skewers
excerpt: Grilled shrimp skewers with lemon and herbs
steps: Marinate shrimp in olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs
Grill skewers until shrimp is cooked through

seo.title: Lemon Herb Shrimp Skewers Recipe
seo.description: Enjoy these flavorful grilled shrimp skewers with a hint of lemon and herbs.

title: Garlic Parmesan Shrimp Stir Fry
excerpt: Quick and easy shrimp stir fry with garlic and Parmesan
steps: Stir fry shrimp in garlic until pink
Add soy sauce and Parmesan, cook until sauce thickens
Serve hot over rice or noodles

seo.title: Garlic Parmesan Shrimp Stir Fry Recipe
seo.description: Make this easy garlic Parmesan shrimp stir fry for a quick and flavorful meal.
